race.name: Human
race.fluff: Passionate, adaptable people who learn quickly and accomplish mighty deeds within their short lives.
race.language: You know the Common language and one additional common language.

raceTalent.name: Adaptable.
raceTalent.description: You gain one additional talent roll at 1st level.

race.name: Dwarf
race.fluff: A short, sturdy creature fond of drink and industry.
race.language: You know the Common and Dwarvish languages.

raceTalent.name: Stout.
raceTalent.description: Roll your hit dice gains with advantage.

race.name: Elf
race.fluff: Ethereal beings with magical powers, ambivalent towards everyday people and capable of either helping or hindering them.
race.language: You know the Common, Elvish, and Sylvan languages.

raceTalent.name: Farsight.
raceTalent.description: You get a +1 bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons or a +1 bonus to spellcasting checks.

newraces.name: Fey
newraces.fluff: Diminutive beings possessing inexplicable, supernatural abilities, leading a hidden lifestyle.
newraces.language: You know the Common and Sylvan languages.

raceTalent.name: Being of magic.
raceTalent.description: You have advantage on checks for overcoming malicious magical effects.
